About Me

Let me tell you something about myself and what I do...

My name is Erick

I am passionate about the software world, for now I am a front-end web developer and self-taught programmer interested in learning new technologies and creating projects that allow me to improve my skills as a programmer. Web development keeps me motivated every day, it has allowed me to acquire skills in various programming languages and to point my objectives to more paradigms of this discipline to become a fullstack web developer. I love programming, reading, exploring new places, and playing video games. Take a look at this website to see some of my projects!

I Specialize In

Web programming UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile aplications.

Coding

I follow best programming practices to keep code readable, clean, and portable.

UI/UX

The interaction with the site and the visual experience are a fundamental standard to follow in all my projects.

Visual Design

Most of my projects adapt to different sizes of mobile devices and tablets
